Title: Main: Gilded Breakthrough
Descriptions: Survivor, your efforts have proven invaluable. With the circuit boards you retrieved, we've managed to restore communication to the outside world. But that's not all; I received a message from Dr. Elena, our esteemed colleague. She's been working tirelessly to improve our computer systems, but she needs additional resources for a breakthrough. I have a task for you. Take these gold nuggets; they were salvaged from a cache we discovered in the hills. Dr. Kuznetsova believes that with the purity of these nuggets, she can enhance the reliability of our computer systems, ensuring more efficient communication and data processing. Your journey has already made a significant impact on our camp, and this contribution will further fortify our technological capabilities. Go with haste, Survivor, and may this endeavor yield the improvements we desperately need.
